issue.title: Atlas falls when stepping with libAtlasSimInterface3.so.3.0.0

content.raw:
How are you sending the step commands? 

BDI advised us to use a swing height of `0.1` and we've recently made the change in our [keyboard_teleop.py script](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/b662781d670278b3b4d122d5cb73cbd261fe8fde/drcsim_gazebo/scripts/keyboard_teleop.py?at=drcsim_4.2#cl-63) (this value is passed to `AtlasPlugin` and used by `AtlasBehaviorWalkParams`) and the robot walks ok.
content.html:
How are you sending the step commands?

BDI advised us to use a swing height of 0.1 and we've recently made the change in our keyboard_teleop.py script (this value is passed to AtlasPlugin and used by AtlasBehaviorWalkParams) and the robot walks ok.
